thread.title: Adam Kwarasey's Black Stars return delayed again as he fails to make squad for Canada friendly
thread.title_full: Adam Kwarasey's Black Stars return delayed again as he fails to make squad for Canada friendly

title: Adam Kwarasey's Black Stars return delayed again as he fails to make squad for Canada friendly
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 00:10 CET Adam Kwarasey's Black Stars return delayed again as he fails to make squad for Canada friendly - www.ghanasoccernet.com Adam Kwarasey 
Goalkeeper Adam Kwarasey's return to the Black Stars has been delayed after he was excluded from Ghana's squad to face Canada in a friendly. 
The in-form Portland Timbers gloves man was expected to end his 16-month self-imposed international exile with the Black Stars set to play in the United States. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
